text: he imanavala'o! Ajnanum palana karo, allaha ta'ala ane payagambarani ane tamara manthi je'o (sasaka tatha dharmaguru'o) che, pachi jo ko'i vastumam vivada karo to tene allaha ane payagambara tarapha pheravi do, jo tamane allaha ta'ala para ane kayamatana divasa para imana hoya, a ghanum ja uttama che ane parinama pana srestha che
